pullRequest.title: Remove usage of .watches system index in full cluster restart.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Make use for the cluster state api to check the index.format setting
of the .watches index instead of querying the index settings api.
This removes the last direct usage of .watches index mentioned in #62501.

commit.message:
Remove usage of .watches system index in full cluster restart.

Make use for the cluster state api to check the index.format setting
of the .watches index instead of querying the index settings api.

This removes the last direct usage of .watches index mentioned in #62501.

nodes.bodyText: nit: GET /_cluster/state/metadata/.watches would be tiny bit more efficient.
